info.name: surveys-app
info.description: Documentation for the surveys app API.

request.description: This Protected API endpoint allows you to upload an image on the server and get a resized (50x50) image in return, hosted on the server filesystem.

item.name: Convenient

request.description: This Protected API endpoint allows you to fetch all surveys.

item.description: Documentation for additional API endpoint that's here merely for convenience, feel free to ignore.

item.name: Required

request.description: This Public API endpoint allows a user to authenticate with any arbitrary username & password. Any valid combination (non-empty) of username/password will result in a JWT token being created and set on an HTTP-only cookie which the client will return with every request.

header.value: jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VySWQiOiJiMTAyNGYyNy1kZWMxLTRjNzgtOWU4Yy1jM2NiZmE4YTFjMDQiLCJpYXQiOjE2OTUwMzc4MDEsImV4cCI6MTY5NTA0MTQwMX0.I2CekAnf8b32HvCaAR5e98C6tWvgJTa7DAINTU_NrFM; Max-Age=3600; Path=/; Expires=Mon, 18 Sep 2023 12:50:01 GMT; HttpOnly; Secure; SameSite=None

request.description: This Protected API endpoint allows you to create a new survey with a name and description.
This Protected API endpoint allows you to View the survey results given a valid survey ID.
This Protected API endpoint allows you to create a question on a survey using the survey ID and question text.

item.name: Create  Answer on a Survey Question

request.description: This Protected API endpoint allows you to create an answer for a valid question belonging to a valid survey.

item.description: Documentation for the main endpoints that make up the surveys app backend.
